item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @Pigrear Pigrear
item.description:
@Pigrear wrote:

The zeros are how far the npc can move in each direction.

To permanently spawn an object you put it in client.java under your globalobjects…

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

if (command.startsWith("ob")) { int objectid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(3)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; makeGlobalObject(absx, absy, objectid, 0, 10); sM("Object added"); }
Here is the command to temporarily spawn an object but my question is that is there a way to make the command make it spawn PERMANENTLY?
Also just like my npc command would it be possible to separate the old codes with the codes from the command?
Source: Delta
server: 317

Read full topic
